title: PICS: From Skolopad's dress of feathers to Miss SA's glittering gown, here's what celebs wore to the 2019 Feather Awards
text:
PICS: From Skolopad's dress of feathers to Miss SA's glittering gown, here's what celebs wore to the 2019 Feather Awards share this

Johannesburg – From beauty queens to actors and singers, local celebs stepped out in style for the 11th Annual Feather Awards held at Fox Junction in Johannesburg on Thursday.



As usual, fashion on the red carpet did not disappoint. While Miss South Africa 2019 Zozibini opted for a sparkling gown with a deep plunging neckline and high slit, popular celeb couple Reason and LootLove did not hold back either, donning glamorous looks that could stand the test of time.

Skolopad walked the red carpet again this year, wearing an outfit made from strategically placed white feathers, and a gold lace woven headpiece which also covered her face.

The show was hosted by media personalities Pabi Moloi, Moshe Ndiki and Rami Chuene.



Winners on the night included Busiswa for Performer of the Year and Bujy and Nandos for Drama Queen of the Year.

description: From beauty queens to actors and singers, local celebs stepped out in style for the 11th Annual Feather Awards held at Fox Junction in Johannesburg.
